hadiths.text: Jabir (Allah be pleased with him) reported Allah's Messenger (ï·º) as saying:Never does a Muslim plants a tree except that he has the reward of charity for him, for what is eaten out of that is charity; what is stolen out of that, what the beasts eat out of that, what the birds eat out of that is charity for him. (In short) none incurs a loss to him but it becomes a charity on his part
